law.catch_line: Activity not deemed restraint of trade.
law.text: No association meeting or activity undertaken in pursuance of the provisions of KRS 247.850 to 247.865 and intended to benefit all of the producers, retailers, and handlers of eggs shall be deemed or considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
